document.full_text: jockey ruby walsh, just back from a long injury layoff, won the showpiece race on the opening day of the cheltenham festival after guiding 11-4 favorite hurricane fly to champion hurdle victory tuesday.
document.title: walsh wins champion hurdle on hurricane fly
lines_and_colors: jockey ruby walsh, just back from a long injury layoff, won the showpiece race on the opening day of the cheltenham festival after guiding 11-4 favorite hurricane fly to champion hurdle victory tuesday.
